entry.title: proof4.12
entry.content:
(a)$素数p的因子为1和p,故$

(b)$p^{2}的因子为1，p，p^2，故$

(c)$p^{k}的因子为1，p，p^2，…,p^k故$
$F(p^k)=\phi(1)+\phi(p)+\phi(p^2)+…+\phi(p^k)$
$ =1+(p-1)+(p^2-p)+…+(p^k-p^{k-1})$
$=p^k$

(d)$pq的因子为1，p，q，pq,故$
$F(pq)=\phi(1)+\phi(p)+\phi(q)+\phi(pq)$
$=1+(p-1)+(q-1)+(p-1)(q-1)$
$=pq$

(e)$假设m的因子为c0，c_1，…，c_x,$
$n的因子为d_0,d_1,…,d_y,$
$则mn的因子为:$
$c_0d_0,c_0d_1,…c_0d{y-1},c0d_y,$
$c_1d_0,c_1d_1,…c_1d{y-1},c1d_y$
…
$c_xd_0,c_xd_1,…c_xd{y-1},cxd_y$
$由于m的所有因子和n的所有因子都是互素的$
$（因为m，n互素），故任意取a<x,b<y,有：$
$\phi(c_ad_b)=\phi(c_a)\phi(d_b),故有：$
$F(mn)=\Sigma{i=0}^x\Sigma{j=0}^y\phi(c_id_j)$
$=\Sigma{i=0}^x\Sigma{j=0}^y\phi(c_i)\phi(d_j)$
$=\Sigma{i=0}^x\phi(ci)\cdot\Sigma{j=0}^y\phi(d_j)$
$=F(m)F(n)$

(f)$令n=p_0^{k_0}p_1^{k_1}…p_t^{k_t},$
$其中p_0,p_1,…,p_t是互异的素数
则：$
$由(c),(e)易知：$
$F(n)=F(p_0^{k_0})F(p_1^{k_1})…F(p_t^{k_t})$
$=p_0^{k_0}p_1^{k_1}…p_t^{k_t}=n$
$证毕。$

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
